Description:
Determine whether native and non-native images are correctly copied
      to the system Clipboard.

Determine whether non-copyable page content such as UI widgets are
      correctly omitted from the Clipboard content.

Determine whether extremely large images can be copied from web
      pages.

Determine whether complicated rich text (such as massively nested
      tables) can be copied.

Verify that dragging an image across browser windows
      opens the image

Verify that you can drag a bookmark from the Bookmarks menu
      to the Personal Toolbar.

Verify that when you encounter a Web site that could be prefilled,
      that you are given the pre-fill dialog and when you click ok, the
      information is filled into the form.

Feature: Delete Form Data - remove field value
Description:
Verify that if you delete data in the Form Manager, that this
      data is not shown as an option when prefilling a form.

Verify that there is a tab for help and you can create a Help
        Sidebar tab with dynamic information

Verify that there is Troubleshooting Help about the problem "if you
        can't sign on"

Determine whether Understanding Privacy help content displays
        correctly
Determine whether What's new in Netscape 6 displays correctly

Determine whether the New to the net tutorial displays
        correctly
Change the History View to Group by Day|Site|None

Determine whether displaying animated GIFs result in single server
        request for the image, rather than additional requests upon each frame
        change.

Determine whether GIF 89a images are properly displayed across
        different bit depths.

Verify that when you have designated not to ever save a username and
      password in password manager, this information can be viewed in the
      password manager through preferences (expedia.com)

Verify that you can remove a site and username from the passwords
      never saved section of password manager (ivillage.com)
Verify that a search query/results can be bookmarked

Currently, it is my understanding that there will be no new
        features in this area (can monitor bug list)
Verify that changes reflect immediately from Bookmarks Manager
Open a nonexistent (bogus) web location.
Verify if themes exist under View menu

The active window is visually distinct, inactive = grey title
        bar.
Click and drag thumb to scroll page
